languages.text: Воспользовавшись слепым пятном защитных турелей, десантные шаттлы высадили элитные отряды на борт крейсера. Пока они отбивались от вопящих еретиков, технопровидцы вразумили духов машины главного когитатора и инициировали процедуру благодатного очищения внутренних палуб. Трупы культистов мы вычищали из отсеков еще три дня.

traits.locale_text: Воспользовавшись слепым пятном защитных турелей, десантные шаттлы смогли высадить элитные отряды в ближайший к мостику шлюз. Пока они отбивались от потока вопящих еретиков, технопровидцы взразумили духов машины главного когитатора и инициировали протокол "Чистка". Трупы культистов мы вычищали еще три дня.

languages.text: Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.
languages.original_text: Воспользовавшись слепым пятном защитных турелей, десантные шаттлы высадили элитные отряды на борт крейсера. Пока они отбивались от вопящих еретиков, технопровидцы вразумили духов машины главного когитатора и инициировали процедуру благодатного очищения внутренних палуб. Трупы культистов мы вычищали из отсеков еще три дня.

While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

languages.text: 我们的穿梭机利用炮塔的盲点，将精锐部队运送到了巡洋舰上。战斗部队与尖叫的异端分子发生战斗，而引擎先知则负责与主沉思者的机魂讲道理，在内部甲板启动了受祝福的净化程序。到了最后，我们整整花了三天时间，才把所有邪教徒的尸体从飞船上丢出去。
languages.original_text: Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

traits.locale_text: 我们的穿梭机利用炮塔的盲点时机，将精锐部队运送到了巡洋舰上。战斗部队与尖叫的异端分子发生战斗，而引擎先知则负责与主思考器的机魂讲道理，在内部甲板启动了受祝福的净化程序。到了最后，我们整整花了三天时间，才把所有邪教徒的尸体从飞船上丢出去。

languages.text: Nos navettes ont profité de l'angle mort des tourelles pour faire monter des troupes d'élite à bord du croiseur. Tandis qu'elles s'occupaient des hérétiques, les technaugures ont raisonné avec les esprits de la machine du cogitateur principal et lancé le protocole de purification sacré sur les ponts inférieurs. Il nous a ensuite fallu trois jours pour dégager tous les cadavres de cultistes des compartiments.
languages.original_text: Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

traits.locale_text: Nos navettes ont profité de l'angle mort des tourelles pour faire monter des troupes d'élite à bord du croiseur. Tandis qu'elles s'occupaient des hérétiques, les technaugures ont raisonné avec les esprits de la machine du cogitateur principal et lancé le protocole de purification sacré sur les ponts inférieurs. Il nous a ensuite fallu trois jours pour dégager tous les cadavres de cultistes des compartiments.

languages.text: 我々のシャトルはタレットの盲点をついて精鋭部隊を巡洋艦に配備した。彼らが悲鳴を上げる異端者たちと交戦している間、機関整備師たちは主考算機の機械精霊と折り合いをつけて、内部デッキで祝福された浄化プロトコルを開始した。カルト狂信者の死体をコンパートメントから運び出すのに3日かかった。
languages.original_text: Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

traits.locale_text: 我々のシャトルはタレットの盲点をついて精鋭部隊を巡洋艦に配備した。彼らが悲鳴を上げる異端者たちと交戦している間、機関整備師たちは主考算機の機械精霊と折り合いをつけて、内部デッキで祝福された浄化プロトコルを開始した。カルト狂信者の死体をコンパートメントから運び出すのに3日かかった。

languages.text: Nuestras lanzaderas usaron el punto ciego de las torretas para desplegar tropas de élite en el crucero. Mientras se enfrentaban a los furiosos herejes, los visioingenieros razonaron con los espíritus máquina del cogitador central e iniciaron el bendito protocolo de purga en las cubiertas interiores. Tardamos tres días en sacar los cultistas muertos de los compartimentos.
languages.original_text: Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

traits.locale_text: Nuestras lanzaderas usaron el punto ciego de las torretas para desplegar tropas de élite en el crucero. Mientras se enfrentaban a los furiosos herejes, los visioingenieros razonaron con los espíritus máquina del cogitador central e iniciaron el bendito protocolo de purga en las cubiertas interiores. Tardamos tres días en sacar los cultistas muertos de los compartimentos.

languages.text: Unsere Shuttles nutzten den toten Winkel der Geschütze, um Elitetruppen an Bord des Kreuzers abzusetzen. Während diese mit den kreischenden Ketzern kämpften, appellierten die Maschinenseher an die Vernunft der Maschinengeister des Hauptcogitators und leiteten auf den inneren Decks die gesegneten Läuterungsprotokolle ein. Es dauerte drei Tage, die Leichen aller Kultisten aus den Modulen zu tragen.
languages.original_text: Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.

traits.locale_text: Unsere Shuttles nutzten den toten Winkel der Geschütze, um Elitetruppen an Bord des Kreuzers abzusetzen. Während diese mit den kreischenden Ketzern kämpften, appellierten die Maschinenseher an die Vernunft der Maschinengeister des Hauptcogitators und leiteten auf den inneren Decks die gesegneten Läuterungsprotokolle ein. Es dauerte drei Tage, die Leichen aller Kultisten aus den Modulen zu tragen.

languages.text: Mekiklerimiz, elit birliklerin gemiye çıkmasını sağlamak adına taretlerin kör noktalarından faydalandı. Onlar çığırtan kâfirleri oyalarken Mühedyumlar da ana kavramsayarın makine ruhlarıyla iletişime geçerek iç güvertelerde kutsanmış arınma protokolünü başlattı. Tarikatçıların cesetlerini kompartımanlardan temizlememiz üç günümüzü aldı.
languages.original_text: Our shuttles used the turrets' blind spot to deploy elite troops on board the cruiser. While they were engaged with the shrieking heretics, the Enginseers reasoned with the machine spirits of the main cogitator and initiated the blessed purgation protocol on the inner decks. It took us three days to drag every last cultist corpse out of the compartments.
